sentences.english: Objective To explore the advantages and characteristics of Chinese medicine pills.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討中藥丸劑的優勢特點。

sentences.english: Water-honeyed pills are made of fine powder of crude drugs, using honey and water as binders.
sentences.chinese: 水蜜丸係指藥材細粉以蜂蜜和水爲黏合劑製成的丸劑。

sentences.english: The drop pills were relatively stable.
Then I once again began to tickle his balls, thighs and virgin hole.
sentences.chinese: 然後我再一次開始胳肢他的小丸劑，股和處女洞。

sentences.english: Conclusion Huangyangning dropping pills was absorbed easier than that of Huangyangning tablets.
sentences.chinese: 結論滴丸劑比片劑易於吸收。
